name: Feed The Slime!
description:
"FEED ME! FEED ME! FEED ME!"

Perhaps you should feed The Slime.

WASD/ARROW KEYS to move

SPACEBAR to select or quicksave

Z to undo

R to restart

ESCAPE to exit window or return to menu.

Both mouse and keyboard work when navigating menus.

This game is unfortunately not compatible with mobile. (or at least not compatible with IOS. I don't know about Android or anything else.)

If there is some sort of weird bug, it probably can be solved by reloading the game. Your progress will not be reset. (probably)
